channel.title: reproductible on Vincent Demeester
channel.description: Recent content in reproductible on Vincent Demeester

item.title: Easy Peasy Nix Versions
item.description: This is a convention for using third-party packages in Nix. It has a simple directory structure, makes using the packages straightforward and automatizes updates.

item.title: Nix: A Reproducible Setup for Linux and macOS
item.description: This post describes how I set up a reproducible development environment in a few seconds on any Linux distribution (and potentially macOS as well).
